title: Near Las Vegas Speedway, Large studio apartments, Free premium cable
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Free premium cable', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-On RTC Las Vegas bus lines', '-Near Las Vegas Speedway', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-High speed WIFI included', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Laundry facilities', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Easy freeway access', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
